name: Golf or Die
description:
You are a sentient Golf ball. Your main purpose in life is to put yourself into holes. Spread throughout this "mini golf " course are holes. So get busy putting yourself into them. 

This game is a project I worked on for my Game Workshop class at Fitchburg State University. I used this assignment to further understand 3D modeling, especially 3D tools in a game engine. Please forgive me if this game seems boring at the moment, I plan on revisiting Golf or Die later on to create a more detailed level.
